[id='ssh-key_con']
= SSH keystore
The {CENTRAL} *Admin* page includes a configurable SSH keystore service that provides SSH authentication. The SSH keystore includes extensible APIs that enable custom implementations and support for the following SSH public key formats:

* `ssh-rsa`
* `ssh-dss`
* `ecdsa-sha2-nistp256`
* `ecdsa-sha2-nistp384`
* `ecdsa-sha2-nistp521`
 
Users can register and manage their SSH public keys from the *Admin* page. The SSH public keys are stored in the `{securityFolderPath}/pkeys/{userName}/` folder.

[NOTE]
====
To use a different path, set the value of the `appformer.ssh.keys.storage.folder`.
====

Each SSH public key consists of a pair of files:

* **{keyId}.pub**: A file containing the SSH public key content, for example:
+
[source]
----
ssh-rsa  userName
----
+
[NOTE]
====
The file name determines the logic key ID on the system. Do not modify the file name during runtime. 
====
* **.{keyId}.pub.meta**: A file containing the key metadata in JSON format, for example:
+
[source, json]
----
{
    "name":"Key",
    "creationDate":"Oct 10, 2018 10:10:50 PM",
    "lastTimeUsed":"Oct 11, 2018 12:11:23 PM"
}
----
+
If a key has no metadata, a new metadata file is dynamically generated.
